Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through cell phones or other electronic devices
Summary: Requires retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through cell phones or other electronic devices; provides for civil penalties.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through cell phones or other electronic devices
